Command-Line Macros

You can pass information about the archive or project being acted upon to an event trigger. One method of doing this is to pass a command-line macro. The following table lists the macros available to event triggers.

Command-Line Macro Name Definition
__EventArchive__ A fully qualified path, including the name of the archive.
__EventWorkfile__ The name of the workfile.
__EventUserID__ The user ID of the person performing the operation.
__EventChgDesc__ The change description. Limited to 1K in size except when used with the parameter file method of passing event information.
__EventRevision__ The revision number being operated on.
__EventVersion__ The version label.
__EventLock__ The value is YES if a lock was requested and is not defined otherwise.
__EventGroup__ The promotion group assigned to the revision.
__EventJournalFile__ The name of the journal file.
__EventJournalEntry__ The journal entry line that was written to the journal file.
__EventDate__ The date when the event trigger was executed. The format of the date is packed decimal numeric. For example, January 20, 1998 appears at 19980120.
__EventTime__ The time when the event trigger was executed. The format of the time is packed decimal numeric. For example 2:35:26 P.M. appears as 143526.
__EventFQPWorkfile__ A fully qualified path, including the workfile name.
__EventConfigFiles__
(desktop client only)		 A fully qualified path, including the names of the configuration files listed in the order that Version Manager reads them. This list does not include the master configuration file, if any. Values are separated by semicolons (;)
__EventMasterConfigFile__
(desktop client only)		 A fully qualified path, including the name of the master configuration file, if any.
__EventArchiveName__
(desktop client only)		 The name of the archive.
__EventServerWorkfile__
(desktop client only)		 A fully qualified path, including the name of the workfile on the server.
__EventClientWorkfile__
(desktop client only)		 A fully qualified path, including the name of the workfile on the client or full path if stand-alone.
__EventProjectDB__
(desktop client only)		 A fully qualified path, including the name of the project database being used.
__EventProjectName__
(desktop client only)		 A fully qualified path, including the name of the project in the project database.
__EventItemSelectionType__
(desktop client only)		 How the item being processed was selected. The possible values are ProjectDB, Project, Folder, File, Revision, VersionLabel, and Group (promotion group).
EventFolderPath
(desktop client only)		 A fully qualified path, including the name of the folder.
